mapper.select: SELECT TBP.ID, TBP.ART_POST_DATE, TBP.USER_ID, TBP.ART_ID, TBA.ART_TITLE, TBA.ART_CATEGORY, TBA.ART_MATERIAL, TBA.ART_SIZE, TBA.ART_DESCRIPTION, TBA.ART_END_DATE, TBA.USER_ID, TBI.ART_IMG_NAME, TBI.ART_IMG_PATH, TBI.ART_ID, TBU.USER_NAME, TBC.COMMENT_CONTENT, TBC.COMMENT_DATE, TBCL.COMMENT_ID, TBCL.USER_ID, TBCL.COMMENT_LIKE_TIME FROM TBL_ART_POST TBP JOIN TBL_ART TBA ON TBP.ART_ID = TBA.ID JOIN TBL_ART_IMG TBI ON TBI.ART_ID = TBA.ID JOIN TBL_USER TBU ON TBP.USER_ID = TBU.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_COMMENT TBC ON TBP.ID = TBC.ART_POST_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_COMMENT_LIKE TBCL ON TBC.ID = TBCL.COMMENT_ID

SELECT TBP.ID, TBP.ART_POST_DATE, TBP.USER_ID, TBP.ART_ID, TBA.ART_TITLE, TBA.ART_CATEGORY, TBA.ART_MATERIAL, TBA.ART_SIZE, TBA.ART_DESCRIPTION, TBA.ART_END_DATE, TBA.USER_ID, TBI.ART_IMG_NAME, TBI.ART_IMG_PATH, TBI.ART_ID, TBU.USER_NAME, TBC.COMMENT_CONTENT, TBC.COMMENT_DATE, TBCL.COMMENT_ID, TBCL.USER_ID, TBCL.COMMENT_LIKE_TIME, TBU.USER_EMAIL FROM TBL_ART_POST TBP JOIN TBL_ART TBA ON TBP.ART_ID = TBA.ID JOIN TBL_ART_IMG TBI ON TBI.ART_ID = TBA.ID JOIN TBL_USER TBU ON TBP.USER_ID = TBU.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_COMMENT TBC ON TBP.ID = TBC.ART_POST_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_COMMENT_LIKE TBCL ON TBC.ID = TBCL.COMMENT_ID WHERE TBP.ID = #{id}
